data: {"concept_id": "pronoun", "concept_name": "Pronoun", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "element", "definition": "Reference tool that controls cohesion, point of view, stance, and rhythm.", "axes": "type|person|number|case|stance", "axis_values": "personal|demonstrative|relative|interrogative|indefinite|expletive | first|second|third | singular|plural | subject|object|possessive | intimate|neutral|distant", "source_file": "Pronoun.md", "source_md5": "e33a39813791c2375d70061629426e2d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "pronoun", "error_id": "ambiguous_antecedent", "description": "Pronoun could point to multiple nouns.", "fixit": "Rename or restructure; anchor the antecedent.", "example_fix": "Clarify ‘she’ when two women are in play.", "source_file": "Pronoun.md", "source_md5": "e33a39813791c2375d70061629426e2d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "pronoun", "error_id": "agreement_mismatch", "description": "Pronoun doesn’t match number/gender where relevant.", "fixit": "Align with antecedent; use singular they when appropriate.", "example_fix": "‘Each student… they…’ (acceptable)", "source_file": "Pronoun.md", "source_md5": "e33a39813791c2375d70061629426e2d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "pronoun", "error_id": "case_mistake", "description": "Subject/object/possessive case misused.", "fixit": "Choose correct case; test by stripping others.", "example_fix": "‘for him and me’ not ‘he and I’.", "source_file": "Pronoun.md", "source_md5": "e33a39813791c2375d70061629426e2d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_pronoun_audit", "concept_id": "pronoun", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Run a pronoun audit on a paragraph: fix reference, person, number, case, and stance.", "expected_features": "Clarity rises; rhythm improves.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "type|person|number|case|stance", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Pronoun.md", "source_md5": "e33a39813791c2375d70061629426e2d", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}
